releaseNotes:
- Visual improvements: Changes have been made to the user interface to enhance the visual appearance of the application, making it more attractive and easier to use.
- New mods update: Support for the latest version of mods has been added, allowing users to enjoy new features and improvements in their gaming experience.
- Wallpapers: New wallpapers have been included that users can select to customize the appearance of the application.
- Bug fixes: Several user-reported bugs have been fixed, improving the overall stability and performance of the application.
